agents.name: ai-coordination
agents.description: Manages all agent branch operations via worktree. Agent branches named after mechanical objects (wrench, hammer, etc.).
agents.naming: Run agent-ops/scripts/init-agent.sh once per session to generate agent name and store in untracked-notes/agent-ops.json
agents.purpose: Handles session lifecycle and agent branch git operations so orchestrator stays on product branch
when_to_use: At session start (first thing) - check for outstanding work
Starting new feature/task - add to WIP list
Reporting any significant work (implementation, testing, error, decision)
Completing feature - archive and update WIP
